text: qwertyuiop$ASDFGHJKL$z x c v b n m
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.$Glib jocks quiz nymph to vex dwarf.$How vexingly quick daft zebras jump!
Shall I compare thee to a summer's day?$Thou art more lovely and more temperate.$Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May,$And summer's lease hath all too short a date.
Gwynn y byt freuer mor yw dihent. heno gwedy colli kenueint. o anffawt vyn tauawt yt lesseint.
